title: Understanding Social Media's Role
text: Social media platforms are increasingly being used for more than just social interactions. They serve as vital tools for information dissemination.

title: Information Sharing
text: Consider how social media can quickly spread information to a large audience, especially during emergencies.

hintAnswer: They're used to update communities about natural disasters
title: Identifying the Correct Use
text: Which of the following is a way social media is used as a trusted source of information?
choices: They're used to update communities about natural disasters
They're used to connect classmates and coworkers
They're used to share personal videos
They're used by organizations to push a political agenda
